name: Gravestone
description:
This is a story of a Gravestone, a Soulkeeper. It's your job to listen to others' final words and take their souls.

It's just another mission, another client. Nothing special.

Just keep in mind: Gravestones only listen and carry. Stay silent and still, remember everything you see and hear. 

P.S When the worst thing happened, finishing your client's life is neccessary.
